translations.chinese: 沛父兄皆頓首曰：「沛幸得復，豐未得，唯陛下哀 矜。」
translations.english: The Pei fathers and brothers all bowed their heads and said: "Pei luckily obtained exemption. Feng has not obtained it. We beg Your Majesty to pity us."

translations.chinese: 上曰：「豐者，吾所生長，極不忘耳。
translations.english: The emperor said: "Feng is where I grew up. I cannot forget it extremely.

translations.chinese: 吾特以其為雍齒故反我為魏。」
translations.english: I especially because it was for Yong Chi's sake that they rebelled against me for Wei."

translations.chinese: 沛父兄固請之，乃并復豐，比沛。
translations.english: The Pei fathers and brothers firmly requested it. So he also exempted Feng, equal to Pei.

translations.chinese: 漢別將擊布軍洮水南北，皆大破之，追斬布番陽。
translations.english: Han separate generals attacked Ying Bu's army north and south of Tao River. All greatly defeated them and pursued, beheading Ying Bu at Fanyang.
